snippet: A fugitive at the heart of a prison break in Mali’s capital on Monday was being held in the 2011 kidnapping of two French men who ended up in the hands of Al Qaeda’s regional faction, sources said Tuesday.
abstract: Mahamed Aly Ag Wadoussene, fugitive at heart of prison break in Bamako, Mali, is suspect in 2011 kidnapping of two Frenchmen who ended up in the hands of Al Qaeda's regional faction.
lead_paragraph: A fugitive at the heart of a prison break in Mali’s capital on Monday was being held in the 2011 kidnapping of two French men who ended up in the hands of Al Qaeda’s regional faction, sources said Tuesday.

headline.main: Mali: Escapee Was Suspect in Frenchmen’s Kidnapping
headline.print_headline: Mali: Escapee Was Suspect in Frenchmen’s Kidnapping
